Function.doc:
Turns shade on/off

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * None
Function.name: toggleShade

Variable.doc:
Contains the alpha (transparency) of the overlay, from 0.0 (completely
transparent to 1.0 (completely opaque). Default is 0.5.
stripped_doc: Contains the alpha (transparency) of the overlay, from 0.0 (completely
Variable.name: shadeTransparency
Variable.desc: Contains the alpha (transparency) of the overlay, from 0.0 (completely

Variable.doc: Flag for Shade status, 'false' means shade off, 'true' means on.
stripped_doc: Flag for Shade status, 'false' means shade off, 'true' means on.
Variable.name: shadeIsOn
Variable.desc: Flag for Shade status, 'false' means shade off, 'true' means on.

desc: Creates a semitransparent overlay to reduce screen brightness.
doc:
Creates a semitransparent overlay to reduce screen brightness.

Download: https://github.com/Hammerspoon/Spoons/raw/master/Spoons/Shade.spoon.zip

Method.doc:
Sets up the Spoon

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * None
Method.name: init

Method.doc:
Turn the shade on, darkening the screen

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * None
stripped_doc: Turn the shade on, darkening the screen
Method.name: start
Method.desc: Turn the shade on, darkening the screen

Method.doc:
Turn the shade off, brightening the screen

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * None
stripped_doc: Turn the shade off, brightening the screen
Method.name: stop
Method.desc: Turn the shade off, brightening the screen

Method.doc:
Binds hotkeys for Shade

Parameters:
 * map - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following item:
  * toggleShade - This will toggle the shade on/off, and update the menubar graphic
E.g.: { toggleShade = {"cmd","alt","ctrl"},"s" }

Returns:
 * None
Method.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * map - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following item:
